segments.text: I need somebody to come over and fix my internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For some reason it's just not connecting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you been having this problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It hasn't been working the past few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the internet come up at all ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It does , but it won't connect to anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the internet isn't down , so there must be something wrong with your connection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you send someone to fix it today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll send somebody over right away to fix it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They should be there in the next hour .
segments.speaker: S2
